content: **emerald song headband** is an easy to knit project using dk weight yarn knit in the round with simple knits purls and slipped stitches you ll finish this fun headband in a flash ***this pattern has been tech edited *** **latest update march 2024** > ***this pattern is free but if you d like to show your appreciation please > consider buying me a coffee 1 *** > > **let s stay connected ** subscribe to my newsletter 2 ⭐ follow me > **@knitfarious** 3 on instagram ----------------------------------------------------------------- **finished size ** 17 43cm circumference x 3 75 9 5 cm height unstretched fits up to 20 head stretched **yardage requirements ** used approximately 60 yds / 55m finished size and amount of yarn needed may vary depending on yarn choice and gauge **circular knitting needles ** this pattern is worked in the round on size u s 6 4mm 16 40 cm circular knitting needles **gauge ** knit in pattern using u s size 6 needles 10 sts x 18 row = 2 in stitch pattern gauge is not absolutely necessary but is recommended for best fit and look **skill level advanced beginner** if you are comfortable knitting and purling can slip a stitch and knit in the round you can knit the emerald song headband **skills needed ** how to long tail cast on 5 knit stitch 6 purl stitch 7 how to join in the round 8 how to slip a stitch how to bind off 9 this pattern uses standard u s knitting terms ------------------------------------------------------------------ > please use the hashtag **#emeraldsongheadband** and follow me on instagram **@knitfarious** to share photos i love seeing your finished projects 1 https //www buymeacoffee com/knitfarious 2 https //knitfarious com/ 3 https //www instagram com/knitfarious/ 5 https
